StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_ODSE_Populate_AllMarineLeads]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
IF (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODSE_AllMarineLeads) > 0 TRUNCATE TABLE ODSE_AllMarineLeads
INSERT ODSE_AllMarineLeads (SSN, NEW_LEAD) SELECT SSN, 0 FROM dbo.ODSE_BridgeToPSR
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * Add Marines not in database (check component code and eas) First insert will insert ac.ve duty Marines with EAS less than 300 days Second insert will insert IRR Marines * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
INSERT ODSE_AllMarineLeads (SSN, NEW_LEAD) SELECT I.SSN , 1 FROM POS..ODSE.INDIVIDUAL_MARINE I JOIN POS..ODSE.MARINE_INFO M ON I.SSN = M.SSN WHERE I.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('11', '12', 'C1', 'C2', 'C3', 'B1', 'B2', 'B3', 'B4', 'K6') AND I.RECORD_STATUS_CODE IN ('0', '4') AND I.EXPIRATION_OF_ACTIVE_SERVICE - getdate() < 366 AND I.SSN NOT IN (SELECT SSN FROM ODSE_AllMarineLeads) AND ( M.RESERVE_EXP_CURRENT_CONTRACT >= DATEADD(YEAR, -5, getdate()) OR M.RESERVE_EXP_CURRENT_CONTRACT IS NULL )
INSERT ODSE_AllMarineLeads (SSN, NEW_LEAD) SELECT I.SSN, 1 FROM POS..ODSE.INDIVIDUAL_MARINE I JOIN POS..ODSE.RESERVE R ON I.SSN = R.SSN JOIN POS..ODSE.MARINE_INFO M ON I.SSN = M.SSN JOIN POS..ODSE.SEPARATION S ON I.SSN = S.SSN WHERE R.TRAINING_CATEGORY_PAY_GROUP = 'H' AND M.RESERVE_RECORD_STATUS_CODE IN ('0', '1') AND S.REENLIST_RECOMMENDATION_CODE NOT IN ('1C','2A','2B','2C','3A','3B','3D','3F','3H','3P','4A','4B') AND I.ZIP_CODE > '00000' AND I.RESERVE_REPORTING_UNIT_CODE NOT IN ('88870','88871','88872') AND I.SSN NOT IN (SELECT SSN FROM ODSE_AllMarineLeads) AND ( M.RESERVE_EXP_CURRENT_CONTRACT >= DATEADD(YEAR, -5, getdate()) OR M.RESERVE_EXP_CURRENT_CONTRACT IS NULL )
INSERT ODSE_AllMarineLeads (SSN, NEW_LEAD) SELECT I.SSN , 0 FROM POS..ODSE.INDIVIDUAL_MARINE I JOIN POS..ODSE.MARINE_INFO M ON I.SSN = M.SSN WHERE I.SSN NOT IN (SELECT SSN FROM ODSE_AllMarineLeads) AND RIGHT(I.SSN, 9) IN ( SELECT SSN FROM PERSON P JOIN RECRUIT R ON R.PERSONID = P.PERSONID JOIN RECRUITCURRENTLEAD RCL ON RCL.RECRUITID = R.RECRUITID JOIN APPLICANTPACKAGE AP ON AP.LEADID = RCL.LEADID JOIN LEADSTATUSDISPOSITION LSD ON LSD.LEADID = AP.LEADID WHERE StatusDisposi.onID = 22)
